title: Tower Semiconductor forecasts quarterly revenue above estimates on data-center boom
description: Israeli contract chipmaker Tower Semiconductor forecast fourth-quarter revenue above estimates on Monday, driven by strong demand for its specialty analog chips used in data centers and artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:
The company expects quarterly revenue of $440 million, plus or minus 5%, compared with analysts' average estimate of $434.4 million, according to data compiled by LSEG.

title: A Square Capital to launch $40 mn VC fund, targets healthcare, tech, consumer sectors
description: The fund will be sector-agnostic, but plans to place a strong emphasis on healthcare, technology, deep tech, artificial intelligence, fintech, and consumer brands, aiming to offer extensive end-to-end support to founders beyond just capital.

title: Applied Digital Announces Proposed Offering of $2.35 Billion of Senior Secured Notes
description: DALLAS, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Applied Digital Corporation (NASDAQ: APLD) ('Applied Digital” or the 'Company”), a leading designer, builder and operator of high-performance, sustainably engineered data centers and colocation services for Artificial Intelligence ('AI”), cloud, networking, and blockchain workloads, today announced that its subsidiary, APLD ComputeCo LLC ('APLD Compute”), intends to offer, subject to market conditions and other factors, $2.35 billion aggregate principal amount of senior secured notes due 2030 (the 'Notes”), in a private offering to persons reasonably believed to be qualified institutional buyers in reliance on Rule 144A under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the 'Securities Act”).
content: DALLAS, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Applied Digital Corporation (NASDAQ: APLD) ("Applied Digital” or the "Company”), a leading designer, builder and operator of high-performance, sustainably engineered data centers and colocation services for A... [7963 chars]

title: UBS sets S&P 500's 2026 year-end target at 7,500 on AI-driven rally
description: Wall Street's artificial intelligence-driven rally will extend into 2026, UBS Global Research said on Monday, as the brokerage set the S&P 500 index's year-end target for next year at 7,500, betting on strong corporate earnings and gains in a concentrated but resilient technology sector.
content:
The benchmark index is nearing the 7,000-point mark, having closed at 6,728.80 on Friday, spurred by investor optimism around AI, robust corporate profits and expectations of falling interest rates.
